foreignData.name: Nachtleben der Ghule
foreignData.text: Bestimme für jeden Spieler eine Kreaturenkarte in dessen Friedhof. Bringe die bestimmten Karten unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel. Sie sind zusätzlich zu ihren anderen Farben und Typen schwarze Zombies und erhalten Verwesung.

foreignData.name: Velada de los necrófagos
foreignData.text: Por cada jugador, elige una carta de criatura en el cementerio de ese jugador. Pon esas cartas en el campo de batalla bajo tu control. Son Zombies negros además de sus otros colores y tipos y ganan la habilidad de descomposición.

foreignData.name: Soirée pour les goules
foreignData.text: Pour chaque joueur, choisissez une carte de créature dans le cimetière de ce joueur. Mettez ces cartes sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle. Ce sont des zombies noirs en plus de leurs autres couleurs et de leurs autres types et elles acquièrent la décomposition.

foreignData.name: Serata dei Ghoul
foreignData.text: Per ogni giocatore, scegli una carta creatura nel cimitero di quel giocatore. Metti quelle carte sul campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo. Sono Zombie neri in aggiunta ai propri altri tipi e colori e hanno decomposto.

foreignData.name: グールの夜遊び
foreignData.text: 各プレイヤーの墓地から、それぞれクリーチャー・カード１枚を選ぶ。それらのカードをあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出す。それらは他の色やタイプに加えて黒のゾンビであり、腐乱を得る。

name: Ghouls' Night Out
originalText: For each player, choose a creature card in that player's graveyard. Put those cards onto the battlefield under your control. They're black Zombies in addition to their other colors and types and they gain decayed.

rulings.text: The creatures will enter the battlefield simultaneously. They will see each other enter for the purposes of triggered abilities.
If any creature cards put onto the battlefield this way become permanents that aren't creatures because of another effect, those permanents won't be Zombies, but they will gain decayed.

text: For each player, choose a creature card in that player's graveyard. Put those cards onto the battlefield under your control. They're black Zombies in addition to their other colors and types and they gain decayed. (A creature with decayed can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
